title: NetworkManager + Lobby UI
description: Layer 0: Multiplayer foundation. Create NetworkManager autoload with ENetMultiplayerPeer for host/join. Simple lobby UI with host button, join button + IP input, connection status. Signals for peer_connected/disconnected. Test: two game instances can connect.
close_reason: NetworkManager + Lobby UI implemented and verified

title: Second test ticket: verify beads workflow
GameEvents + Day Loop
description: Layer 2: GameEvents autoload as signal bus (PatientArrived, StationCompleted, DayEnded). DayManager with phases: Preparation → DayActive → DayComplete. SpawnManager triggers patient spawns during day. Server controls day state, clients observe. Test: day starts, patients spawn, day ends.
close_reason: GameEvents signal bus, DayManager with phases, SpawnManager implemented and verified

title: Station System (Processing)
description: Layer 2: BaseStation that accepts items and processes them. States: Idle → Processing → Completed → Dirty. Timer-based processing. Server authoritative. Accept item via drop, run timer, emit completion signal. Test: drop cube at station, see timer, cube state changes on completion.

title: Interaction Core (Pickup/Drop)
description: Layer 1: Server-authoritative interaction system. Player has interaction Area2D. Interactable base class for pickupable objects. RPC pattern: client requests pickup → server validates → server updates state → all clients see. HeldItem synced via MultiplayerSynchronizer. Test: pick up test cube, other player sees you holding it.

title: Patient Entity + States
description: Layer 2: Patient as primary game entity. States: Waiting → InTreatment → Discharged. Patience timer that depletes while waiting. Visual feedback (color change when impatient). Pickupable by player (uses Interaction Core). Server spawns patients, syncs to clients.

title: Player System (Spawn + Movement)
description: Layer 0: Player entity with multiplayer sync. Player.tscn with CharacterBody2D, MultiplayerSynchronizer for position. MultiplayerSpawner to create players on connect. Movement uses is_multiplayer_authority() check. Test: both players see each other move smoothly.

title: Hospital Game MVP Prototype
description: Multiplayer-native hospital management game prototype. PlateUp!-style co-op where 2 players manage patients through diagnosis and treatment stations. Layer 0-1 builds multiplayer foundation, Layer 2+ adds game content.
